title: MTEL-1107 FOUNDATIONS OF HEALING TOUCH, COURSE 1
cleaned_text: TOUCH, COURSE 1 Healing Touch is a nurturing, heart-centered, energy therapy that supports one's inherent ability to self-heal. Gentle, intentional touch assists in balancing physical, emotional, mental, and spiritual well-being. In this experiential class, students will learn concepts underlying holistic healthcare practices, biofield systems, and techniques which have been found to be beneficial for self-care and assisting others in reducing anxiety, depression and pain, strengthening the immune system, cancer care, recovery from surgery, and a myriad of health challenges. This is Course 1 of the Healing Touch International (HTI) Healing Touch Certificate Program.
